caption.title: Self-assembly mode analysis of surface ligands.
caption.p: ( A) Different direction views of monomeric (SR-Au-SR) staple. The white arrows point in the orientation of the benzene ring. Yellow, gold; green, sulfur; gray, carbon; white, hydrogen. ( B) Weak interactions between the interacted 10 ligands. Red dashed lines, C-H⋅⋅⋅π interaction; blue dashed lines, H⋅⋅⋅H interaction.
